elements.name: q1
elements.title: 1. You ask your parents or another family member for a loan to help you through a difficult financial time.

elements.name: 1_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your family would want to help you?

elements.name: 1_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that they would agree to help as much as they can.

elements.name: q2
elements.title: 2. You approach a close friend to talk after doing or saying something that seriously upset him/her.

elements.name: 2_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your friend would want to talk with you?

elements.name: 2_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she would want to talk with me to try to work things out.

elements.name: q3
elements.title: 3. You bring up the issue of sexual protection with your significant other and tell him/her how important you think it is.

elements.name: 3_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over his/her reaction?

elements.name: 3_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she would be willing to discuss our possible options without getting defensive.

elements.name: q4
elements.title: 4. You ask your supervisor for help with a problem you have been having at work.

elements.name: 4_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not the person would want to help you?

elements.name: 4_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she would want to try to help me out.

elements.name: q5
elements.title: 5. After a bitter argument, you call or approach your significant other because you want to make up.

elements.name: 5_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your significant other would want to make up with you?

elements.name: 5_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she would be at least as eager to make up as I would be.

elements.name: q6
elements.title: 6. You ask your parents or other family members to come to an occasion important to you.

elements.name: 6_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not they would want to come?

elements.name: 6_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that they would want to come.

elements.name: q7
elements.title: 7. At a party, you notice someone on the other side of the room that you'd like to get to know, and you approach him or her to try to start a conversation.

elements.name: 7_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not the person would want to talk with you?

elements.name: 7_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she would want to talk with me.

elements.name: q8
elements.title: 8. Lately you've been noticing some distance between yourself and your significant other, and you ask him/her if there is something wrong.

elements.name: 8_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not he/she still loves you and wants to be with you?

elements.name: 8_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she will show sincere love and commitment to our relationship no matter what else may be going on.

elements.name: q9
elements.title: 9. You call a friend when there is something on your mind that you feel you really need to talk about.

elements.name: 9_concern
elements.title: How concerned or anxious would you be over whether or not your friend would want to listen?

elements.name: 9_expectancy
elements.title: I would expect that he/she would listen and support me.
